    • update

      public void update()

    • registerListener

      public void registerListener(EventHandler.Event event, Consumer<EventHandler> listener)
      Register a new event listener for this event handler and this component.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to listen for
      listener - the listener containing logic to be executed if the specified event happens

    • getComponent

      public Element getComponent()

    • isMouseButtonClicked

      public boolean isMouseButtonClicked(int button)
      Check, whether a mouse button has been clicked (pressed and released again) in this update loop. Should be used inside the EventHandler.Event.MOUSE_CLICK, will probably lead to false in any other case.
      Parameters:
      button - the mouse button to check, e.g. GLFW.GLFW_MOUSE_BUTTON_LEFT
      Returns:
      true if and only if the button has been clicked

    • callEvent

      public void callEvent(EventHandler.Event event)
      Call a specific event. Note: This might lead to unexpected and unwanted behaviour, when used wrongly.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to call
